text: Maṉitarkaḷai accamūṭṭi eccarippataṟkākavum, īmāṉ koṇṭavarkaḷukku avarkaḷuṭaiya iṟaivaṉiṭam niccayamākap perum patavi kiṭaikkum eṉṟu naṉmārāyam kūṟuvataṟkākavum, avarkaḷiliruntē nām oru maṉitarukku vahī aruḷkiṟōm eṉpatil makkaḷukku āccariyam ēṟpaṭṭu viṭṭatā? Kāḥpirkaḷō, "niccayamāka ivar pakiraṅkamāṉa cūṉiyakkārarē" eṉṟu kūṟukiṉṟaṉar
